      • removeAll

        @DELETE
 @UnitOfWork
 @RolesAllowed(value="AUTHENTICATED")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response removeAll()
        Remove all Activitys from the store. Only authenticated user with AUTHENTICATED role can execute it
        Returns:
        the Response
